code: https://mghp.osn.xsede.org/bir190004-bucket01/index.html#TMA11/zarr/ # Ludwig, https://community-bioc.slack.com/archives/C03MKFSS7V2/p1656686685346239 import s3fs import zarr import xarray as xr fs = s3fs.S3FileSystem(anon=True, key="dummy", secret="dummy",     client_kwargs={'endpoint_url': "https://mghp.osn.xsede.org/"}) mapper = fs.get_mapper('bir190004-bucket01/TMA11/zarr/5.zarr') library(reticulate) zr = import("zarr") loc = "https://mghp.osn.xsede.org/bir190004-bucket01/index.html#TMA11/zarr/5.zarr" c5 = zr.load(loc) dim(c5)
